<h3 id="X405">X(405)&nbsp;=&nbsp;EULER LINE INTERCEPT OF LINE X(1)X(6)</h3>
Trilinears &nbsp;&nbsp; bc(a + b + c) + abc cos A : :
<br>
Trilinears &nbsp;&nbsp; bcS + raS<sub>A</sub> : :
<br>
Barycentrics&nbsp;&nbsp; b + c + a(1 + cos A) : :
<br>
Barycentrics&nbsp;&nbsp; a*(a^3 - a*b^2 - 2*a*b*c - 2*b^2*c - a*c^2 - 2*b*c^2) : :

<p>
As a point on the Euler line, X(405) has Shinagawa coefficients (abc*$a$ + S<sup>2</sup>, -S<sup>2</sup>).
</p>
<p>

</p>
<p
>X(405) is the {X(2),X(3)}-harmonic conjugate of X(474). For a list
        of harmonic conjugates of X(405), click <b>Tables</b> at the top of
        this page.</p>
<p>
X(405) = complement of X(377)<br>
X(405) = anticomplement of X(8728)<br>
X(405) = crosssum of X(838) and X(1015)<br>
X(405) = crossdifference of every pair of points on line X(513)X(647)<br>
X(405) = inverse-in-orthocentroidal circle of X(442)<br>
X(405) = {X(1),X(9)}-harmonic conjugate of X(72)<br>
</p>
